page.title: 17Penkridge Middle School
page.content: Penkridge Middle School is a new school which was built in 1978 .It has 4 different years and about 30 different teachers. It has many different sports facilities for football, rugby, cricket hockey and rounders. It also has a running track and places for field events .There are many different clubs which take place at dinner time and home time .For each year you can go to places of interest and to do with the year's topic. In the first year you aren't put into groups for subjects but as you progress through the school you are put into ability groups. You go into groups for craft: woodwork, pottery, painting, cookery and sewing. You have 4 lessons of sport, games and PE. We also have an assembly twice a week.
